Sound.comm: The sound quality is excellent, clear, and undistorted at high volumes.

cont.entity_a: The sound quality is comparable to more expensive systems.
cont.entity_b: The sound quality exceeds expectations when connected to a TV.

Bass.comm: The bass is powerful and can be overwhelming.

cont.entity_a: The bass is solid and effective.
cont.entity_b: The bass is deep and clear with less distortion.

Durability.comm: The system is durable and continues to perform well after many years.

Installation.comm: The system is easy to install and provides excellent sound quality.

Value.comm: The system is a great value for the price.

Compatibility.comm: The speakers provide great sound for movies and gaming.

cont.entity_a: The speakers provide excellent sound quality for movies and gaming.
cont.entity_b: The system provides a mini-theater feeling and sound.

cont.entity_a: A controller knob allows for power, volume, and bass adjustment, and includes a headphone jack.
cont.entity_b: Limited control over sound beyond volume and superbass.

cont.entity_a: The subwoofer is large and requires adequate space.
cont.entity_b: The system is wired, and cords are short.
